description: Return the data for a query with the Network Flow Monitor query interface. You specify the query that you want to return results for by providing a query ID and a monitor name. This query returns the top contributors for a scope for workload insights. Workload insights provide a high level view of network flow performance data collected by agents. To return the data for the top contributors, see GetQueryResultsWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData. Create a query ID for this call by calling the corresponding API call to start the query, StartQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributors. Use the scope ID that was returned for your account by CreateScope. Top contributors in Network Flow Monitor are network flows with the highest values for a specific metric type. Top contributors can be across all workload insights, for a given scope, or for a specific monitor. Use the applicable call for the top contributors that you want to be returned.

parameters.name: scopeId
parameters.description: The identifier for the scope that includes the resources you want to get data results for. A scope ID is an internally-generated identifier that includes all the resources for a specific root account.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The identifier for the query. A query ID is an internally-generated identifier for a specific query returned from an API call to create a query.

nested_items.name: topContributors
nested_items.description: The top contributor network flows overall for a specific metric type, for example, the number of retransmissions.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account ID for a specific row of data.

nested_items.name: localSubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet identifier for the local resource.

nested_items.name: localAz
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Availability Zone where the local resource is located.

nested_items.name: localVpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the VPC for the local resource.

nested_items.name: localRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the local resource is located.

nested_items.name: remoteIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of a remote resource.

nested_items.name: localSubnetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a local subnet.

nested_items.name: localVpcArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a local VPC.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
